com.sails.map.overlay

Class TextOverlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sails.map.overlay.TextOverlay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OverlayItem

    public class TextOverlay
extends java.lang.Object
implements OverlayItem
    A Circle consists of a center GeoPoint and a non-negative radius in meters.

    A Circle holds two android.graphics.Paint objects to allow for different outline and filling. These paints define drawing parameters such as color, stroke width, pattern and transparency. Anti-aliasing should be enabled to minimize visual distortions and to improve the overall drawing quality.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextOverlay

        public TextOverlay(GeoPoint geoPoint,
           java.lang.String text,
           Paint paintFill,
           Paint paintStroke)
        Parameters:
        geoPoint - the initial center point of this circle (may be null).
        text - text to show.
        paintFill - the initial Paint used to fill this circle (may be null).
        paintStroke - the initial Paint used to stroke this circle (may be null).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given radius is negative.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public boolean draw(BoundingBox boundingBox,
           byte zoomLevel,
           Canvas canvas,
           Point canvasPosition,
           int centerX,
           int centerY,
           float rotationAngle)
        Description copied from interface: OverlayItem
        Draws this OverlayItem on the given canvas.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface OverlayItem
        Parameters:
        boundingBox - the geographical area which should be drawn.
        zoomLevel - the zoom level at which this OverlayItem should draw itself.
        canvas - the canvas on which this OverlayItem should draw itself.
        canvasPosition - the top-left pixel position of the canvas on the world map at the given zoom level.
        Returns:
        true if this OverlayItem is visible and has drawn itself, false otherwise.
